name: THE .EXECUTIONER
description:
There can always be more than one .exe file LORE

You wake up to spend yet another day doing your "favorite" job - beta-testing games. This time, you got a new message from your co-worker "James". The message has a file attached to it, it's titled "THE .EXECUTIONER". You decide to boot it up, what could possibly go wrong..?

GAMEPLAY

Travel through various .exe files and solve puzzles that were given to you by THE .EXE GUIDER. Can you solve the great mystery of THE .EXECUTIONER?

Use the arrow keys to move | Z to perform an action | Sometimes the game will require you to use your mouse

Enjoy playing THE .EXECUTIONER
